pr_title: [Chat Sdk for Android]: Update README.md and CHANGELOG.md for publishing

timeline.message: Update README.md and CHANGELOG.md for publishing

timeline.bodyText: I think you also need to update the version to 1.0.0-beta.2
timeline.author: angiurgiu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -80,7 +80,9 @@ The id for the user created above will be necessary later to add said user as a
 
 ## Chat Thread
 
-A chat conversation is represented by a chat thread. Each user in the thread is called a thread member. Thread members can chat with one another privately in a 1:1 chat or huddle up in a 1:N group chat. Users also get near real-time updates for when others are typing and when they have read the messages. To learn more, read about chat concepts [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/communication-services/concepts/chat/concepts).
+A chat conversation is represented by a chat thread. Each user in the thread is called a thread member. Thread members can chat with one another privately in a 1:1 chat or huddle up in a 1:N group chat.
+
+Users also get near real-time updates for when others are typing and when they have read the messages. To learn more, read about chat concepts [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/communication-services/concepts/chat/concepts).
 
 # Chat operations

timeline.bodyText: I think beta 3 should be added after the release.
timeline.author: RezaJooyandeh

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove the second paragraph, without signaling, it does not make a lot of sense
timeline.author: RezaJooyandeh

replies.bodyText: "and read receipts for the messages they have read". Do you mean "and send receipts for the messages they have read"?
replies.author: JianpingChen
